document.full_text: aditi brennan kapil, who wrote 'agnes under the big top,' uses an unparalleled vantage point to examine the psychological dislocation in the life of an immigrant.
document.title: theater review | connecticut: stories of isolation in an urban circus
lines_and_colors: aditi brennan kapil, who wrote 'agnes under the big top,' uses an unparalleled vantage point to examine the psychological dislocation in the life of an immigrant.
